overview: A girl's journey from the tender years of childhood through a melancholic adolescence into the dreamy days of young adulthood.  The film, inspired by the visual aesthetics and themes of director Sofia Coppola, outlines the transition from a girl's tender childhood to a more mature adulthood. The heroine travels in times and places that mark the passage to new chapters of her life. A poetic journey is condensed into one day.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

title: Girlhood
